title: Smart Data Models - WindContPType4bIEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. P control model Type 4B.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.5.5.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindContPType4bIEC

WindTurbineType4bIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind turbine type 4B model with which this wind control P type 4B model is associated. Default: None

dpmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum wind turbine power ramp rate (). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

tpaero.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant in aerodynamic power response (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

tpord.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant in power order lag (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

tufilt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage measurement filter time constant (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0
